Token.Abstract: NSObject category methods for Kobold Kit
Performs a selector with delay, with 'self' automatically sent to the selector.

Parameter.Name: aSelector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to perform. Selector must take a single id parameter.

Parameter.Name: delay
Parameter.Abstract: The time to wait (in seconds) before performing the selector.

Token.Abstract: Performs a selector in background, with 'self' automatically sent to the selector.

Parameter.Name: aSelector
Parameter.Abstract: The selector to perform. Selector must take a single id parameter.
